pr_title: Added ability to rebind control key

timeline.message: Merge branch 'control-rebind' of https://github.com/mzegar/runelite into control-rebind

timeline.bodyText: I don't think a new section for this is required. Having no section usually implies miscellaneous.
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.bodyText: You can also just put this in setUp I think
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.bodyText: From testing on my system and talking to abex, it seems like this should be new ModifierlessKeybind(KeyEvent.VK_UNDEFINED, InputEvent.CTRL_DOWN_MASK);. Optionally we could just make this not have a default value and check for null, although we don't do that for the other keybinds.
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.message:
key remapping: add control remap
